review: I own quite a few streaming sticks and the Fire Stick is by far our favorite, so much that we don't even use the others anymore. Its fast, responsive, and has all the media we want. Best of all is the remote control feature. My motherinlaw is not the best technologically speaking, but she can work a remote. Its so nice not having to explain to her how to use a phone to control it when I can just give her the remote and I'm done. If your thinking of getting a media stick, GET THIS ONE.
author: Russell J Young
